Meteara: I am Meteara, second Vok emissary. I was sent here to prevent 
degradation of this vector. I was planning to eradicate everyone when 
things would start getting out of hand, but one of your kind made me 
realize that I could work with you and not only against you. Do you 
trust me enough to want to work with me?


> {Talos}
> 
>     Talos looked up from the energon realizing his mistake in his 
orders and
> sighed. This day had simply been to hectic. "Maximals, back to 
base!"
> Turning he looked upon Meteara. "I'm commander of the maximals on 
this
> mission what can I do for you?"
> 
>     He turned more fully to face the bot tucking the blast sheild he 
was
> carrying onto a hitch at his back, ignoring the dark glare Grimlock 
cast his
> way even as the metallic dinobot stomped back towards the maximal 
ship.
